channel.title: Security on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: TeleAntiFraud-28k: A Audio-Text Slow-Thinking Dataset for Telecom Fraud Detection
item.description: TeleAntiFraud-28k: A new audio-text dataset designed for telecom fraud detection, tackles data scarcity with innovative synthesis techniques and slow-thinking annotations.

item.title: ELTEX: A Framework for Domain-Driven Synthetic Data Generation
item.description: ELTEX: Domain-driven synthetic data generation framework improves LLM performance in cybersecurity with less resources.

item.title: Can Community Notes Replace Professional Fact-Checkers?
item.description: Community moderation success relies on fact-checking!
